CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 这样；这么；那样；那么；如此；非常；很；极；极其；确实；实际上；同样；同样地；事实上；一定；的确；的确如此；确切地说；如此看来；因此；所以；不如…（这么…）；不像…（那样…）
（表示因果关系）因此；所以；（表示目的）以便；为了；其次；然后

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。
用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。

word_group.brief_definition: 到这种程度, 到目前为止, 迄今为止
(做或安排得)井井有条, 有条不紊
尽管如此, 即使那样
如果这样, 如果如此, 假如这样
从长远考虑, 做长远打算；再见

bilingual.source: So she went to the market place.

bilingual.target: 所以我学了一门新语言。

bilingual.source: OK, so we must be on time.
bilingual.target: 好的，所以我们必须准时。
所以我们每天都会去那里。
所以我给她买了一辆自行车。

bilingual.source: So, we decided to go to the mall.

bilingual.target: 所以要明智地学习并学好。

list.abstract: SO（英 [səʊ]，美 [soʊ]），英语单词，作副词为这么、那么、像这样等。作连词为因此；所以；旨在等。作名词为大调音阶的第5音（同SOH）。短语搭配为so that（所以）。例句有“Salt takes in plenty of water, so most bacteria can not live in a salty environment.（盐会吸收大量水分，因此大多数细菌无法在含盐环境中生存）”。 SO作副词的近义词有thus、this；作连接词的近义词有thus、therefore。
在信任的样子以后，体验极端的价值。比较贴近生活的歌词，开头也是比较俏皮的节奏。听出的是不同的深度，总之，很值得回味。

yingyinNormal.en: So you hit her in the face?
So? So they still seem normal. That's because they are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以呢？她们似乎很正常。

yingyinNormal.en: So am I supposed to thank you?

yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你真的喜欢这个秀？

yingyinNormal.en: So I guess it's Joey then. I mean...
So that's what I'm back to now.
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.zh: 但愿望已经用掉了，所以……

yingyinNormal.en: So, this is how it's gonna go down.

yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你是抵抗组织的人？
所以家里没有做音乐的？
所以你不喜欢这样，是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So you want me to carry this bag?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你要我带着这个包？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 这么; 那么; 非常
这样; 如此; 的确
(and so on)等等; 诸如此类

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to such a great extent; extremely
sense_info_list.zh: 这么; 那么; 非常

examination_example.sentence: Of course, many discussions are not <highlight>so</highlight> successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，很多讨论并没有这么成功。

examination_example.sentence: This kind of thinking is why <highlight>so</highlight> many people try to avoid arguments, especially about politics and religion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种思维就是为什么那么多人尽量避免争论，尤其是关于政治和宗教的争论。

examination_example.sentence: He reads <highlight>so</highlight> passionately that his parents have to institute a "no reading policy" at the dinner table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他阅读热情非常之高，以至于他的父母不得不在餐桌上制定“禁止阅读政策”。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight>, the number of buses and bus lanes were increased, and drivers were rewarded or punished according to the time they took.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，公共汽车和公共汽车车道的数量增加了，司机根据他们所花的时间得到奖励或惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists need journals in which to publish their research, <highlight>so</highlight> they will supply the articles without monetary reward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家需要在期刊上发表他们的研究成果，因此他们将提供论文而不需要金钱奖励。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> don't be afraid to ask more personal questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以不要害怕问更多的私人问题。

sense_info_list.en: referring back to something previously mentioned
sense_info_list.zh: 这样; 如此; 的确

examination_example.sentence: People who do <highlight>so</highlight> probaly live <highlight>so</highlight> cautiously that they go nowhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样做的人可能生活得非常谨慎，以至于他们哪儿也去不了。

examination_example.sentence: They are acting because national governments — Britain's and others across Europe — have failed to do <highlight>so</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们之所以采取行动，是因为各国政府——英国和欧洲其他国家的政府——没有这样做。

examination_example.sentence: We want more for our kids, and rightfully <highlight>so</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望我们的孩子得到更多，这是理所当然的。

examination_example.sentence: The Government has pledged to change the law to introduce a minimum service requirement <highlight>so</highlight> that, even when strikes occur, services can continue to operate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府已承诺修改法律，引入最低服务要求，以便即使发生罢工，服务也能继续运作。

examination_example.sentence: The success of Sci-Hub shows the legal ecosystem has lost legitimacy among its users and must be transformed <highlight>so</highlight> that it works for all participants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Sci-Hub的成功表明，法律生态系统在其用户中已经失去了合法性，必须进行改造，以便使其为所有参与者服务。

examination_example.sentence: They gave justices permanent positions <highlight>so</highlight> they would be free to upset those in power and have no need to cultivate political support.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给了法官永久的职位，以便他们可以自由地扰乱当权者，而不需要培养政治支持。

sense_info_list.en: introducing a new topic, a question or a concluding statement

examination_example.sentence: Female participation on corporate boards may not currently mirror the percentage of women in the general population, but <highlight>so</highlight> what?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，女性在公司董事会的参与度可能无法反映女性在总人口中的比例，但那又怎样呢?

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> how do we navigate this?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么我们该如何导航呢?

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight>, does the Spanish crisis suggest that monarchy is seeing its last days?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，西班牙危机是否表明君主制已经走到了尽头?

examination_example.sentence: Even <highlight>so</highlight>, employers complain they aren't given all the workers they need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，雇主们仍抱怨说，他们没有得到所需的所有员工。

examination_example.sentence: Even <highlight>so</highlight>, kings and queens undoubtedly have a downside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，国王和王后无疑也有缺点。

examination_example.sentence: Even <highlight>so</highlight>, these are wealthy families who party with the international 1%, and media intrusiveness makes it increasingly difficult to maintain the right image.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，这些富有的家庭仍然与1%的国际媒体联手，而媒体的介入使得维持正确形象变得越来越困难。

sense_info_list.en: used after a number, an amount, etc. to show that it is not exact

examination_example.sentence: The Victorians suddenly seem to become more human as the hundred-or-<highlight>so</highlight> years that separate us fade away through our common experience of laughter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 维多利亚时代的人似乎突然变得更有人情味了，因为我们共同的欢笑经历让我们之间相隔的100多年渐渐消失了。

examination_example.sentence: In the last decade or <highlight>so</highlight>, advances in technology have allowed mass-market labels to react to trends more quickly and anticipate demand more precisely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去十年左右的时间里，技术的进步使得大众市场的品牌能够更快地对趋势做出反应，更准确地预测需求。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't matter, <highlight>so</highlight> long as they're enjoyable, and not likely to have negative side effects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没关系，只要它们是令人愉快的，而且不太可能有负面的副作用。

examination_example.sentence: This is an adequate amount <highlight>so</highlight> long as it is aimed in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要目标是正确的，这是一个足够的量。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> does the idea that decisions made by AI systems should be explainable, transparent, and fair.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由人工智能系统做出的决定同样应该是可解释的、透明的和公平的。

examination_example.sentence: Just as some ants farm the bugs called aphids for the honeydew they produce, <highlight>so</highlight> Google farms us for the data that our digital lives yield.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像一些蚂蚁养殖蚜虫，蚜虫产生蜜露为蚂蚁所享用的道理一样，谷歌“饲养”我们，我们又把生活转化成数据为谷歌所用。

sense_info_list.zh: (and so on)等等; 诸如此类

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists first defined the great material ages of human history Stone Age, Iron Age, and <highlight>so</highlight> on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家首先定义了人类历史上伟大的物质时代——石器时代、铁器时代等等。

sense_info_list.en: to the same extent; in the way described or demonstrated
and then; as the next step
introducing a statement which is followed by a defensive comment

word_usage.usage: in so doing和 in doing so含义相同，都表示“这样做，因为这样”，但in so doing相对更老式、更正式。

so that可用来引导目的状语从句，意为“为的是，以便于”。
例：I read more books so that I can catch up with my classmates. 我读更多的书，以便能赶上我的同学。

so that还可接用于引出结果的从句，意为““因此”、“以致”、“所以”。
例：He spoke clearly, so that everybody understood him. 他讲话讲得很清楚，所以大家都听懂了。

so....that 意为“如此……以至于……”，so用来修饰形容词或副词。
例：She was so angry that she couldn't speak. 她太生气了，以至于说不出来话了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> it's important to first find out the words you miss pronounce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，首先找出你漏掉的单词是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> he filled a suitcase full of pepperoni.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他装了满满一手提箱的意大利香肠。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> the main thing is just to show up and be adventurous, trying different foods and talking to strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以主要的事情就是去尝试，去冒险，尝试不同的食物，和陌生人交谈。

examination_example.sentence: How many of the things on your list have you done <highlight>so</highlight> far?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，你已经完成了清单上的多少件事？

examination_example.sentence: The food is <highlight>so</highlight> delicious that you don't need much of it to make you happy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物非常美味，你不需要太多就能让你开心。

examination_example.sentence: This was <highlight>so</highlight> unexpected because I had put the handbrake on when I jumped out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这太出乎意料了，因为我跳下车时踩下了手刹。

examination_example.sentence: If <highlight>so</highlight> we have a vacancy in our team which would suit you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果是这样的话，我们团队有个空缺适合你。

examination_example.sentence: "I don't make them up," she said of the characters in her fiction these last 50 or <highlight>so</highlight> years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “他们不是我编造的，”她在谈到过去50年左右小说中的人物时说。

examination_example.sentence: If this fellow participant is going to eat more, <highlight>so</highlight> will I. Call it the "I'll have what she's having" effect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这位同伴要吃得更多，我也会吃得更多。这就是所谓的“我要吃她吃的东西”效应。

examination_example.sentence: My entire family is hearing, and <highlight>so</highlight> are all my friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我全家都在听，我所有的朋友也在听。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 这么; 那么; 非常

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 到这种程度；到目前为止；迄今为止

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> for the next hour, she talked about her family and her plans for the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，在接下来的一个小时里，她谈到了她的家人以及她对未来的计划。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> I told my mum, "Daisy is more patient than I have ever been."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，我告诉妈妈，“黛西比我更有耐心。”

examination_example.sentence: I tried to run slowly <highlight>so</highlight> that she could follow me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我尽量跑慢一点，以便她能跟上我。

sense_info_list.zh: 这么; 那么; 非常

examination_example.sentence: The boys were <highlight>so</highlight> excited about the basketball match that they stayed up talking in their bedroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男孩们对篮球比赛很兴奋，他们在卧室里彻夜聊天。

examination_example.sentence: Travelling is <highlight>so</highlight> interesting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行非常有趣。

examination_example.sentence: He is <highlight>so</highlight> good at it that he can ride a bicycle in traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很擅长骑车，甚至能在车流中骑自行车。

sense_info_list.en: used to refer back to something that has already been mentioned

examination_example.sentence: Mike didn't understand why Ken said <highlight>so</highlight>, but he realized that it had nothing to do with him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迈克不明白肯恩为什么这么说，但他意识到这与他无关。

examination_example.sentence: why do you do <highlight>so</highlight>？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你为什么要这样做?

examination_example.sentence: Don't you think <highlight>so</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不这样认为吗?

sense_info_list.en: introducing a question or a concluding statement

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> that's what we did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，这就是我们所做的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> what does a buddy (伙伴) do?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，一个朋友会做什么呢?

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>So</highlight> what's next?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，接下来是什么?

word_usage.usage:
so与such区别，其规律由so与such的不同词性决定。such是形容词，修饰名词或名词词组，so是副词，只能修饰形容词或副词。
so so 一般般  
such a fool= so foolish 如此愚蠢
